title: ASSASSINS.CREED.V1.0.ENG.RELOADED.NOCD.ZIP
description:
This is the Fix for all of you trying to Play Assassins Creed.
The version I downloaded was Assassins_Creed_CLONEDVD-PROCYON and they claim you have to use Deamon-Tools Pro advanced version 4.12.0220.0 with SPTD version 1.55. to make it work.

NO WAY, just download the crack, Taken fromand do as stated below.

Some users claim you cant play the Jerusalem mission but im downloading the conversion to Russian. And will report if that works.



  1. Unrar.
  2. Burn the image.
  3. Install the game.
  4. Copy the cracked executable over from the Crack directory on the DVD to
     your installation directory.
  5. Play the game.

Just wanted to share, and If anybody writes virus or shit like that, Just ban, slap, spam and FRY them.
